projects.title: allacampingplatser.se
projects.subTitle: A fullstack application.
projects.name: allacampingplatser
projects.description: A comprehensive camping site discovery platform for Sweden that allows users to search, filter, and explore camping locations across the country. The application features an interactive map with location markers and clusters, detailed information pages for each camping site, and a responsive design that works seamlessly on both mobile and desktop devices. The platform integrates with Contentful CMS for dynamic content management and uses Mapbox for advanced mapping capabilities.
projects.shortDescription: An interactive map-based platform for discovering and exploring camping sites across Sweden with advanced filtering and search capabilities.
features: Interactive Map with Location Markers and Clusters
Responsive Design for Mobile and Desktop
Location Detail Pages with Rich Content
Hover Highlighting Between List and Map Views
Custom Animation Effects for UI Elements
